description: Test suite for cart drawer operations in a React e-commerce web application, written using Jest and React Testing Library. It simulates interactions like adding items to cart, changing quantities, removing items, emptying cart, navigation, and checkout link validation.

methods.name: test('update quantity, remove item, clear cart, and free shipping threshold messaging')
methods.description: Main test case that covers various cart interactions such as updating quantity, removing items, clearing the cart, and checking for messaging related to free shipping within the cart drawer.
